#Text=Obama , Romney battle over foreign policy in final U.S. presidential debate
#Text=Thursday , October 25 , 2012
#Text=2012 US presidential election candidates Barack Obama and Mitt Romney took part Monday in their third and final presidential debate at Lynn University in Florida .
#Text=The topic of the debate was foreign policy and the candidates discussed the Arab Spring , Iran , and Mali , among other issues .
#Text=Barack Obama Image : US Senate .
#Text=Mitt Romney Image : Gage skidmore .
#Text=Mr. Obama criticised Mr. Romney 's foreign policy positions as " all over the map " .
#Text=" Every time you have offered an opinion you have been wrong .

#Text= " You said we should have gone into Iraq , despite the fact there were no weapons of mass destruction .

column1: #Text=You said we should still have troops in Iraq to this day .
#Text=You said we should n't be passing nuclear treaties with Russia .

#Text=" Mr. Romney countered saying Mr. Obama had failed to take proper advantage of the Arab Spring : " I congratulate him on taking out Osama bin Laden and going after the leadership of al-Qaeda , but we ca n't kill our way out of this mess " .

#Text=Mr. Romney criticized his opponent for visiting the Middle East on an  apology tour " , and said he would be tougher with Iran .

column1: #Text=" I think from the very beginning , one of the challenges we 've had with Iran is that they have looked at this administration and felt that the administration was not as strong as it needed to be .

#Text=He said his administration had focused on  those who actually killed us on 9/11 " and said that under his leadership , " al-Qaeda 's core leadership has been decimated " .

column1: #Text=Mr. Romney said northern Mali had been taken over by " al-Qaeda-type individuals " .
#Text=Mr. Romney criticized China for " holding down artificially the value of their currency " .
#Text=He added " on day one , I will label them a currency manipulator , which allows us to apply tariffs where they 're taking jobs .

#Text=Mr. Obama is to travel through Ohio , Florida , Virginia , Iowa , Colorado , and Nevada as well as appearing on The Tonight Show with Jay Leno in a two-day  America Forward Tour " .

column1: #Text=Mr. Romney is to hold two joint rallies with his vice-presidential candidate Paul Ryan in Nevada and Colorado before going on to campaign in Iowa and Ohio .
#Text=Mr. Romney 's advisers said he would also consider making a speech on government spending and debt in the next few days .
